from itertools import permutations
from itertools import combinations_with_replacement
n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(a)
    count = 0
    b = list(permutations(a, 2))
    for j in range(len(b)):
        x = sum(b[j])
        if x > count:
            count = x
    print(count)

from itertools import permutations
from itertools import combinations_with_replacement
n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    a = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(a)
    count = 0
    b = list(permutations(a, 2))
    for j in range(len(b)):
        x = sum(b[j])
        if x > count:
            count = x
    print(count)
